channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Directory Studio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Directory Studio

item.title: CVE-2021-33900|2024-08-04T00:05:51.036Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20directory%20studio
item.description: While investigating DIRSTUDIO-1219 it was noticed that configured StartTLS encryption was not applied when any SASL authentication mechanism (DIGEST-MD5, GSSAPI) was used. While investigating DIRSTUDIO-1220 it was noticed that any configured SASL confidentiality layer was not applied. This issue affects Apache Directory Studio version 2.0.0.v20210213-M16 and prior versions.
